[**Grace Tompkins**](https://grcetmpk.github.io/)

This project was created by Dr. Grace Tompkins, Assistant Professor of Teaching at the University of British Columbia, situated on the traditional, ancestral, and unceded territory of the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam) people. She is a settler from Mi'kma'ki (Nova Scotia) who is passionate about inclusive education.
